ResearchProjectDef.label: alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a transmutation table to start experimenting with transmutation and dark matter.

ResearchProjectDef.label: dark matter alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build dark matter transmutation tables in order to gain the ability to create anti-matter and gain access to more transmutations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: textile transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start research on textiles such as wool and leather. Unlocks access to wool and leather transmutation researches, aswell as gaining the ability to transmute sheep wool and patchleather.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wool transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute all kinds of wool from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: leather transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute all kinds of leather from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: textile transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute human leather and human meat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fabric transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute synthread and later, hyperweave.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plant transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute all kinds of raw plants from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: kibble transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute kibble from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: meat transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute all kinds of raw meats, unfertilized eggs and milk from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: meal transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute fully cooked meals from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pemmican transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute pemmican from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medicine transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute industrial and later, glitterworld medicine from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: dark matter relaying
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build dark matter infused batteries that have much bigger efficiency and capacity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: energy collecting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build dark matter infused solar panels that output much more power under sunlight.

ResearchProjectDef.label: drug transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute drugs from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: anti-matter alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build anti matter transmutation tables that have the ability to transmute exotic items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medical drug transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute medical drugs from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: lavish meal transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute fully cooked, lavish meals from the transmutation table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: anti-matter relaying
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build anti-matter infused batteries that have incredibly huge efficiency and capacity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: survival meal transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transmute packaged survival meals from the transmutation table.
